item.title: Coinsource becomes largest bitcoin ATM operator in America - EconoTimes
item.description:
Coinsource becomes largest bitcoin ATM operator in America - EconoTimes

Digital Currency Coinsource becomes largest bitcoin ATM operator in America Friday, August 5, 2016 4:09 AM UTC Bitcoin ATM network Coinsource has announced that it has installed four new Bitcoin ATMs last month, thereby becoming the largest Bitcoin ATM operator in the United States, and the most geographically diverse.

item.title: Where is bitcoin authority team?
item.description:
Where is bitcoin authority team?

Answer: Bitcoin Don't have any authority team, It basically works on a Peer to Pree Network for e.g. your Torrent Downloader application. item.title: Kim Dotcom has big plans for cloud storage and Bitcoin in 2017
item.description:
Kim Dotcom has big plans for cloud storage and Bitcoin in 2017

Nearly a month ago, former Megaupload founder Kim Dotcom announced that he was working on a brand new version of the cloud storage and hosting service with enhanced security and privacy features. Today, he took to Twitter to reveal more about his vision for the next coming of Megaupload.

item.title: Four New Bitcoin ATMs Make Coinsource America's Largest Operator
item.description:
Four New Bitcoin ATMs Make Coinsource America's Largest Operator

Coinbase has become America's largest bitcoin operator after announcing it has installed four new ATMs in the month of July, bringing the total number to 42 across seven states. The Texas-based company's latest additions include new bitcoin ATMs in New York, Nevada, and Pennsylvania with one installed in Staten Island, one in Las Vegas, and two in Philadelphia.

item.title: Casper May Cause Centralized Staking By Rich Ethereum Holders
item.description:
Casper May Cause Centralized Staking By Rich Ethereum Holders

The Ethereum developers have unveiled some more details regarding the Casper release. As part of this release, Ethereum will also transition from proof-of-work to proof-of-take. Securing the network at that time will be of the utmost importance, as PoS is inherently more prone to network attacks compared to PoW.

item.title: Machine learning can balance risks involved in bitcoin trading
item.description:
Machine learning can balance risks involved in bitcoin trading

In terms of the directional movement of bitcoin the currency, 2015 saw near 40% gains making it one of the best performing financial instruments out there. But often traders are seeking greater returns than that and don't necessarily want the directional exposure, but just want to capture bitcoin's volatility.

item.title: Malta Gaming Authority Refuses Member Requests to Accept Bitcoin
item.description:
Malta Gaming Authority Refuses Member Requests to Accept Bitcoin

The benefits of Bitcoin for the gambling industry have been discussed many times in the past. But some authoritative figures still see Bitcoin as a risk, particularly in the gaming and gambling world. While Malta is quickly becoming a hotbed for iGaming, the adoption of Bitcoin by local companies will take longer than people may want it to.
